forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 53F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 13C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Fog early, then cloudy after midnight. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
